name: Personalized Restaurant Recommender
description: AI-powered restaurant recommendation system that personalizes dining choices based on a user's taste preferences.
keyFeatures: Taste Profile Matching – Builds a customer taste profile from past order history and converts their preferred cuisines into a vector.
Restaurant Flavor Analysis – Analyzes restaurant menus & customer reviews to generate a restaurant taste profile vector.
Personalized AI Recommendations – Uses the cosine similarity algorithm to match restaurants to users based on similarity scores.

name: LinkedIn Extractor
description: A smart web scraping tool that helps job seekers, recruiters, and researchers discover and validate executive LinkedIn profiles from company websites.
keyFeatures: Executive Detection – Automatically identifies CEOs, CTOs, Founders, and other key roles from company websites.
Accurate Name & Profile Matching – Uses Flair NER and search validation to extract names and find correct LinkedIn profiles.
Scalable Analysis – Supports both individual company lookups and bulk processing for large-scale use cases.

name: CLARA
description: A web application that helps government social services provide personalized, proactive support to clients like recovering addicts and ex-prisoners
keyFeatures: Actionable Guidance – Uses LLM models to break down large resource documents into daily, tailored action steps for clients.
Proactive Check-ins – An AI voice agent (powered by VAPI) reaches out to clients for progress updates, helping social workers make informed decisions.
Optimized Client Support – Social workers receive actionable insights based on AI-analyzed check-in data to improve case outcomes.

name: Food Allergy Tracker
description: AI-powered food allergen detector that helps users make informed food choices and track potential dietary distress patterns.
keyFeatures: Allergen Detection – Take a photo of a meal, and OpenAI's API analyzes the image to generate a list of possible ingredients. Known allergens are automatically highlighted.
Real-Time Alerts – Instantly warns users about potential allergens based on their dietary preferences.
Pattern Recognition – Tracks user reactions after meals (e.g., lethargic, energetic) and identifies ingredients that may be causing distress over time.
